name: The Pumpkin Patch - A Halloween Adventure Treat!!
name_original: The Pumpkin Patch - A Halloween Adventure Treat!!
description:
CROWS, PUMPKINS, TREASURES, OH MY!!EXPLORE, COLLECT, DEFEND!

Pumpkin head lives in his pumpkin patch and collects all things pumpkin. On his patch live pesky crows that interfere with his hobbies. But pumpkin head is not so easily dissuaded, as he can spit seeds to rid himself of any enemy.

Pumpkin head loves to search the yards near his patch for anything he can add to his collection. Help pumpkin head find his beloved items as you explore the patch.

The Pumpkin Patch © 2016. All Rights Reserved. Game created by Exploitation Games

KEY FEATURES
  • Item collection & Defend
  • Adventure game
  • Spit pumpkin seeds at crows
  • PLAY "Crow View" or
  • PLAY "Pumpkin View"or
  • PLAY both
  • WIN by collecting all the items or
  • WIN by defeating enough crows
  • Beautiful setting with 3D houses, landscape & objects
  • 3D animation

CONTENT NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNGER AUDIENCES: features crows attacking and seed spitting.

Pumpkinhead animation that led to making the video game.

Pumpkinhead Animation

GAME #3

This is our 3rd game. The map of the game is very large and includes sixteen houses all made by us, using LightWave3D. Game made with Unity3D.
